full_text:
The #49ers officially signed Kemoko Turay. 

I Love that they're adding pass rushing depth. Turay can replicate Arden Key's production that we saw towards the end of last season. 

Solid signing.

For what they charge, Chipotle is the most chintzy fast food place ever. 

My server literally refused to put all the RICE he scooped into my burrito. Back into the bin it went. 

We talkin' rice. Not even meat. That's a whole other story.
